name: endir
author: Cat Pea <corporate.miou@gmail.com> (https://catpea.com/)
description: Command line utility to virtually place all HTML files in a sub directory by prefixing all the absolute paths specified in a, link, img, and script with a user specified prefix.

scripts.save: git add .; git commit -m 'New Release'; git push; npm version patch; npm publish; git push;
